translation.en: Let me see your other hand.
If I move this hand, I'm afraid my stomach will fall out.
translation.zh: 如果移动这手 我担心肠子会掉出来

translation.en: I need to see your other hand.
I miss the Cassie I was.
A totally normal high school girl.
I wonder what that Cassie would think of me now.
translation.zh: 不知道那凯思现在会怎么看我

translation.en: You know, he was supposed to be here.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 他该在这里的

translation.en: Why are the hot ones always so unreliable?
translation.zh: 那些帅的为何总是靠不住！

translation.en: What would I even say to him? I don't know him, and he doesn't even know me.
translation.zh: 该和他说什么？我不认识他 他也一样

translation.en: You're a girl. He's a boy.
translation.zh: 你是个女孩 他是男孩

translation.en: What? You have something against pink?
translation.zh: 什么？你对粉红色有什么意见？

translation.en: No, no. I totally like it.
translation.zh: 不 不 我完全喜欢

translation.en: This is actually my sister's phone.
translation.zh: 这其实是我妹妹的电话

translation.en: I dropped her off at a sleepover, and she took mine by mistake.
translation.zh: 我载她去借宿派对 她无意拿错了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I have it. No, I haven't looked at your text messages.
translation.zh: 是 在我这里 我没有看你简讯

translation.en: but that was the last normal day of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我人生中最后的正常的一天

translation.en: All of us are done for
When you're in high school, just about everything feels like the end of the world.
translation.zh: 高中生活里 任何事感觉就 像世界末日
你能够相信刚发生的事吗？

translation.en: An early curfew, a final exam...
translation.zh: 更早的宵禁 期末考试

translation.en: Sullivan. What are we doing out here? Why not just tell her where you're gonna kick it?
translation.zh: 沙利文 干什么？就告诉她你会 踢哪里吧

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Look at this. It's so freaky.
translation.zh: 嘿 看 看这个 好恐怖

translation.en: That's it. You're done. Off the field.
translation.zh: 够了 你完蛋了 出场

translation.en: No. But, look, it's really weird.
translation.zh: 不 但 看 这很奇怪

translation.en: Give me your phone. Give me your phone.
translation.zh: 拜托 都一样 给我电话 给 我电话

translation.en: Mine doesn't work! -It totally just stopped. -All right, Perkins.
translation.zh: 我的坏了 完全停了

translation.en: what we thought was the end of the world
What, did someone famous die or something?
translation.zh: 什么 有名人去世什么的？

translation.en: It appears to be metallic and of a considerable size.
translation.zh: 似乎是具有相当规模的金属

translation.en: Across the world, social media has been awash with panic and speculation
translation.zh: 在世界各地 社交媒体充斥着恐慌和猜测

translation.en: as these images spread like wildfire.
translation.zh: 同时间这些画面像野火般传开

translation.en: The president has authorized NASA to attempt communication with the object
translation.zh: 总统已授权美国航天局 试图与目标沟通

translation.en: BREAKING NEWS MESSAGE FROM THE WHITE HOUSE
translation.zh: 总统已授权美国航天局 试图与目标沟通 现在正环绕着我们的星球

translation.en: that is now circling our planet
translation.zh: 现在正环绕着我们的星球

translation.en: and is currently over the United States, moving west over Ohio.
translation.zh: 目前在美国 向西移向俄亥俄州

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's right over us.
translation.zh: 噢 天啊 就在我们上面

translation.en: -Wait, what is that? -I have no idea.
translation.zh: -等等 那是什么？ -我不知道

translation.en: There were no messages from our galactic party crashers during the first ten days.
translation.zh: 前十天我们没有 银河系不速之客的讯息

translation.en: But pretty soon, they had a name.

translation.zh: 威尔逊家 也要离开？

translation.en: They say they don't feel safe so close to the city.
translation.zh: 他们说离城市近不安全

translation.en: Lizbeth: Guess who's sitting right behind me...
Everybody look at the equation on the board.
translation.zh: 大家看一下板上的方程

translation.en: will tell him yr avail for end-of-world sex
translation.zh: （会告诉他你愿意来个末日做爱 ）

translation.en: Who can give me the derivative of X?
I'm sure this is just a power outage.

translation.zh: 我的天 发生什么事？

translation.en: The Others hit us with an electromagnetic pulse that killed all the power on the planet.
translation.zh: 异体以电磁脉冲关闭地球所有能源

translation.en: No more everything we took for granted.
translation.zh: 没有一切我们认为理所当然的东西

translation.en: That was the last time I saw Ben Parish.
translation.zh: 那是我最后一次见到宾帕里什

translation.en: Like everyone else in that room.
translation.zh: 像那房里的所有人一样

translation.en: Here, Sam. Grab me another, okay? Thank you.
translation.zh: 来 萨姆 给我另一个 好吗？

translation.en: At the time, we thought that was it.
translation.zh: 那时 我们以为就那样了
然后第二波攻击发生了

translation.en: Come on, Sam. It's an earthquake!
translation.zh: 快 萨姆 是地震！

translation.en: Just keep your head down, okay?
Come here. Hold on to me.
In Ohio, we only had the lake to worry about.
translation.zh: 在俄亥俄州 我们担心的只有湖泊

translation.en: There are over 300 billion birds in the world.
Mom said the avian flu was already one of the world's deadliest viruses.
translation.zh: 妈说禽流感已是 世上最致命的病毒之一

translation.en: In the 3rd Wave, the Others modified it.
translation.zh: 第3波攻击时 异体修改了它

translation.en: And the birds spread it across the planet.
translation.zh: 鸟类使它在世界各地扩散

translation.en: Line A. Line A is for those who have already been assessed.
translation.zh: A线 A线是给那些已进行检验的

translation.en: If you're waiting to be assessed, then proceed to Line B.
translation.zh: 如果你正等待检验 请前往B线
坐下 先生 谢谢你

translation.en: I should be on the area that isn't quarantined!
translation.zh: 我应该在没隔离的区域！

translation.en: -It's okay. I didn't even touch her. -It is not okay. You can't be here.
translation.zh: -没事 我根本没动她 -不行 你不能在这

translation.en: Sweetheart, I need you to go home and look after Sammy, okay?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我要你回家照顾萨姆 好吗？

translation.en: But, Mom, I wanna help you here.
translation.zh: -我要在这里帮你 我要帮忙 -我知道

translation.en: -I know. Can you get her out of here now? -I wanna help.
translation.zh: -我要在这里帮你 我要帮忙 -我知道 你能不能现在让她离开？
-妈 -不 没事 走就是了

translation.en: Miss, you gotta leave. Let's go.
translation.zh: 小姐 你该走了 快走

translation.en: Some people were immune to the virus.
And a few people got sick and somehow recovered.
Why don't they just get it over with?
I think a better question is, "What do they need?"
translation.zh: 我想更好的问题是 “它们需要什么？”

translation.en: They've been very careful so far not to damage it any more than absolutely necessary.
translation.zh: 目前为止他们 一直很小心不破坏不必要的

translation.en: I think that's why they're here, Cassie.
translation.zh: 我想那就是它们来这里的原因 凯思

translation.en: Ready to walk for a while, Sammy?
translation.zh: 萨姆 准备好去走走了吗？

translation.en: Dad, how far is it to the refugee camp?
Just a few miles. We should be there by nightfall.
translation.zh: 就几英里 应该可以在天黑前到

translation.en: -Dad, look. Is this it? -Yeah, buddy. I think so.
translation.zh: -爸 看 是这个？ -是 老友 我想是的

translation.en: Latrines are off to the left.

translation.zh: 食水呢？ 有 不错吧？

translation.en: How many people are there here?
I don't know how many we got now.
translation.zh: 不知道现在我们有多少

translation.en: When's the last time you had a hot meal?
translation.zh: 你多久没吃一顿热饭了？

translation.en: Good. Well, maybe you can walk me through it.
translation.zh: 噢 好 那 不然你解释给我听

translation.en: Here we draw a purple hat.

translation.zh: 哇 爸 这是一个柯尔特点45手枪

translation.en: This button changes out the clip.
You're gonna carry this with you at all times,
you're not gonna tell anybody you have it,
and you're only gonna use it if it's life or death. You got it?
translation.zh: 只能在生死关头才用 知道吗？

translation.en: I thought we were safe here.

translation.zh: 亲爱的 已没有什么是安全的了

translation.en: You gotta get the weeds, guys.
translation.zh: 你们该拔掉那些杂草 各位

translation.en: What is that? I don't know. Come on.
translation.zh: -那是什么？ -我不知道 快来

translation.en: -What's going on? -All right, just take it easy.
translation.zh: 发生什么事？ 好 别紧张

translation.en: I thought the cars didn't work.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am Colonel Vosch of the United States Army.
translation.zh: 各位 我是美国军上校沃什

translation.en: My men and I are from the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
translation.zh: 我和我的军队来自 赖特帕特森空军基地

translation.en: Let's get you people out of here.
translation.zh: 让我们来帮你离开这里

translation.en: We should be ready to go at a moment's notice, all right? Stay with your sister, Sam.
translation.zh: 该马上要走了 知道吗？跟着 姐姐 萨姆

translation.en: -Come on. -You can go right on the bus.
translation.zh: 快来 你可以上巴士

translation.en: Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.zh: 成年人 请到食堂听简报

translation.en: Children, please move to the buses for transport.
translation.zh: 儿童们 请到巴士上

translation.en: We're right behind you. Be good!
translation.zh: 我们就跟着来 要乖！

translation.en: Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.zh: 成年人 请到食堂听简报

translation.en: Do you think they have electricity if the trucks are working?
translation.zh: 如果卡车能动你认为他们有电源吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Why, you still have a phone?
translation.zh: 我不知道 怎么 你还有电话？

translation.en: My orders are to get just the kids onto the bus.
translation.zh: 我被令只能让孩子们上巴士

translation.en: Well, those might be your orders, but they're my kids.
translation.zh: 那 那是你的指令 但他们是 我的孩子
我们会在一起 我们会等另 一辆巴士

translation.en: -We'll wait for another bus. -It's okay, Private.
translation.zh: 我们会在一起 我们会等另 一辆巴士 没关系 列兵

translation.en: Look, you're welcome to keep 'em here with you if you want,
translation.zh: 听着 你要的话可以让他们和你留下

translation.en: but if they were my kids, I'd get 'em on that bus.
translation.zh: 但如果是我孩子 我会让他们 上巴士

translation.en: We have reason to believe there's an imminent threat to this location.
translation.zh: 我们有理由相信这里有迫在 眉睫的威胁

translation.en: We're trying to get everyone to safety as quickly as we can,
translation.zh: 我们尝试尽快让大家到安 全地方

translation.en: and this is the only working transport we've got, so we're taking shifts based on need.
translation.zh: 这是唯有的运输工具 我们根据 需求轮班

translation.en: Kids first, then we come back for the rest of ya.
translation.zh: 儿童优先 然后我们再回来载 其他的

translation.en: Well, how safe is it at Wright-Patterson?
translation.zh: 那么 赖特帕特森有多安全？

translation.en: Safest place there is right now.
And the buses will just come right back?

translation.zh: 让他们下车 马上回来

translation.en: Like I said, it's your call.
translation.zh: 如我说的 由你决定

translation.en: Just 'cause some man in uniform tries to tell us what to do
translation.zh: 就因为穿军装的试图 告诉我们怎么做

translation.en: doesn't mean we actually have to follow his orders.
Okay, I want you on this one, all right?
translation.zh: 我要你上这个 知道吗？

translation.en: -I'll be right behind you. -We can't split up.
translation.zh: -我就跟在你后头 -我们不能分开

translation.en: And we're gonna have dinner tonight. We're going to the same place.
translation.zh: 今晚我们会吃晚餐 我们会去同 一个地方

translation.en: It's the Army, okay? This is our Army. It's fine. It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 是军方 知道吗？是我们的军队 没事的

translation.en: -Don't leave me alone. -All right. Come here.
Take care of your brother. All right? Come here.
translation.zh: 照顾你弟弟 知道吗？过来

translation.en: I want you to listen to your sister, all right? -Okay. -She's in charge.
translation.zh: 我要你听姐姐的 知道吗？ 由她看管

translation.en: I'll be there before you know it.
Here, head to the back, Sam.
translation.zh: 来 去后面 萨姆
-过来 给我你的背包 -熊熊！

translation.en: -I forgot Bear! I need to go get him! -Sam, stop. Sit down.
translation.zh: -什么？停 坐下 -我忘了熊熊！我要去拿！

translation.en: -It's okay. What's up? -I can't. I can't go without him.
translation.zh: -没关系 怎么了？ -不行 没它我走不了

translation.en: All right, all right, all right. I'll go get him, okay?
translation.zh: 好 我去拿 好吗？
留在这 知道吗？我马上回来
留在这 知道吗？我马上回来 答应我？

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be right back. I promise.
translation.zh: 是 我马上回来 我保证

translation.en: This way. Down to the mess hall. In the mess hall now, please.
translation.zh: 这边 到食堂 现在到食堂 请

translation.en: Bear, Bear, Bear. Bear, Bear, Bear, Bear.
Can I have your attention, please?
If you'll all just quiet down.
We believe the 4th Wave has begun.
translation.zh: 我们相信第四波已经开始

translation.en: The Others have come down off their ship.
translation.zh: 异体已从它们的战舰下来

translation.en: Apparently, they have the ability to inhabit human hosts
translation.zh: 显然 他们有栖居人类宿主的能力…

translation.en: What we do know is they have snipers in these woods, and they are targeting survivors.
translation.zh: 我们所知 林里有狙击手 目标是幸存者

translation.en: We've got intel that would suggest some of them could be right here in this very camp.
translation.zh: 我们有情报透露他们其中 可能在这营地

translation.en: So, what... Are you saying that some of us are Others?
translation.zh: 那 什么 ？你是说我们其中 有人是异体？

translation.en: Please. There's a lot we still don't know.
translation.zh: 请别这样 我们还有许多未知的

translation.en: We can detect them in children.
translation.zh: 请别这样 我们还有许多未知的 我们能够检测儿童宿主

translation.en: Unfortunately, the screening procedure for adults is a bit more complicated.
translation.zh: 可惜 成人的检验程序有点复杂
对 我们的孩子怎么样？

translation.en: I know. I know you all wanna get back to your families.
translation.zh: 我了解 我了解你们都要回 到家人身边

translation.en: Unfortunately, we're gonna have to move you all to a secure holding facility
translation.zh: 很遗憾 我们得让大家到 一个拘留所

translation.en: so they can run some screening protocols. Folks, please!
translation.zh: 这样就能进行筛查方案 各位 拜托了！

translation.en: You need to understand, there is no way to differentiate us from the Others
translation.zh: 你们要明白 没有其它方法 除了以全面筛选过程来区别异体
除了以全面筛选过程来区别异体

translation.en: The sooner we get you screened, the sooner we can get you back to your families.
translation.zh: 筛查越早 我们越快让你回到家人身旁

translation.en: I am not an Other, okay? I'm not going anywhere.
translation.zh: 我不是一个异体 知道吗？ 我哪里都不去

translation.en: Sir, no one's saying that you are.
This is the reality of our situation.
Now, if you'd just calm down. Please, just calm down.
Let me out of here. Get out of my way. Watch out.
translation.zh: 让我出去 走开 小心
先生 把武器放下 靠边站 现在
-先生 把武器放下 -杜 不要！

translation.en: You can't keep me in here!
-Everybody, just calm down! -Let me out now!
translation.zh: -各位 请冷静！ -马上让我出去！

translation.en: -I wanna see my kids! -Put it down!
translation.zh: 我要见我的孩子！ 放下！

translation.en: Support team members, meet arrivals on the tarmac.
translation.zh: 支助团队 到停机坪上接机

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.zh: 站在红圈 等你的号码

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.zh: 站在红圈 等你的号码

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.zh: 站在红圈 等你的号码
在隔离区他们叫我“僵尸”

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
Mom and Dad killed by the virus.
But it didn't kill you, did it?
That where the nickname came from?
You get to help avenge her death.
This puts out a signal that we can track.
translation.zh: 这释放出我们可追踪的讯号

translation.en: You kids are the most important thing right now.
translation.zh: 你们这些孩子现在是最重要的

translation.en: We need every one of you to help us fight the Others.
translation.zh: 我们需要你们每一个人来战胜异体

translation.en: This isn't summer camp, Zombie. You're a soldier now.
translation.zh: 这不是夏日营 僵尸 你现在 是兵士

translation.en: So we don't wanna lose you. Stand up.
translation.zh: 所以我们不要失去你 起来

translation.en: How are we supposed to fight the Others if we don't even know what they are?
translation.zh: 我们连他们是什么都不知 要怎么战胜？

translation.en: Don't worry. He won't be able to see us.
translation.zh: 别担心 他看不到我们

translation.en: I know. It's impossible to tell.
translation.zh: 我知道 不可能看出来

translation.en: The Others infest real humans like some sort of parasite.
translation.zh: 异体像寄生虫般侵染真人

translation.en: Take over their minds, their bodies.
translation.zh: 控制他们的思想 身体
药物 放射治疗 手术 完全无效

translation.en: The only way to kill 'em is to kill the host.
translation.zh: 杀它们唯一的方法就是杀了宿主

translation.en: You just need to destroy the thing inside him.
translation.zh: 你只要毁了在他里面的东西
就是那东西 造成这一切的

translation.en: If you're gonna be on my squad,
translation.zh: 如果你在我的队里 我要知道

translation.en: I need to know that you will do whatever it takes to...
translation.zh: 如果你在我的队里 我要知道 你会不惜一切

translation.en: Here's how you kill off a species.
translation.zh: 这是杀死一个物种的方法

translation.en: First, you take out the easy ones, the weak, the exposed.
translation.zh: 首先 去掉容易的：软弱 暴露的

translation.en: Kill them as efficiently as possible.
translation.zh: 尽可能有效地杀死他们

translation.en: That was the first three Waves.
But even if you bug bomb a house, there's always a few cockroaches left.
translation.zh: 但即使你炸了房子 总留下几只蟑螂

translation.en: Now, we are like those cockroaches.
translation.zh: 现在 我们就像那些蟑螂

translation.en: And the Others are picking us off.
And because the Others look like us,
translation.zh: 也因为异体看来和我们一样
离赖特帕特森八十英里

translation.en: How do you rid the world of humans?
translation.zh: 该如何去掉人类的世界？

translation.en: First, you rid the humans of their humanity.
translation.zh: 首先 除掉人类的人性

translation.en: "When I was a child, I spoke as a child.
translation.zh: 我小时候 就像孩子一样说话

translation.en: I thought and I reasoned as a child.
translation.zh: 我像孩子般思考和推断

translation.en: But when I became a man,
Those words never meant more to me than they do right now,
The best and brightest vision of who we are and what we're fighting for.
translation.zh: 代表我们最好及最优秀的 还有我们为之所战斗的

translation.en: Our intelligence tells us the Others are readying themselves for a final attack.
translation.zh: 根据情报异体正准备最后一击

translation.en: What form it will take, we do not know.
translation.zh: 以什么方式 我们不知道

translation.en: there will be no more Waves.
Humanity as we know it will be wiped from the face of the Earth.
I'm gonna tell you some things I know.
So with whatever time we have left,
translation.zh: 那么以我们剩下的时间

translation.en: you will learn to think, speak,
translation.zh: 你会学习思考 说话 移 动和战斗

translation.en: move and fight like the soldiers you are.
translation.zh: 你会学习思考 说话 移 动和战斗 像一名战士一样

translation.en: Let the weight of our loss fuel you.
translation.zh: 让我们的损失成为你们的动力

translation.en: Let the weight of our dead embolden you.
translation.zh: 让死去的亲友激励你们的勇气

translation.en: Let the weight of our hope drive you to victory.
translation.zh: 让希望引领你们迎向胜利
长官 是的 长官！
长官 是的 长官！

translation.en: Where's my gun? Where's my gun?
How the hell do you know my name?
You were bleeding on the highway. I brought you back here, to my house.
translation.zh: 你在公路上大出血 我把你带回家

translation.en: All right, when you found me on the highway, I had my gun. Where is it?
translation.zh: 你发现我时 我的枪还在 它在哪里？

translation.en: -Don't touch me! Don't touch me! Don't... -Your leg.
-This is gonna hurt. -All right. Just do it. Just do it.
How long have I been here?
How far is Wright-Patterson from here?
translation.zh: 赖特帕特森离这里多远？

translation.en: All right, we're not safe anywhere anymore.
translation.zh: 好 我们在哪里都不再安全

translation.en: Why did you wanna know how close Wright-Patterson was?
translation.zh: 你为什么要知道赖特帕特森有多近？

translation.en: The Army took him there, so I...
translation.zh: 军队把他带去那里 所以我

translation.en: I need to get him back.
You gotta get your strength back.

translation.zh: 你为什么把我带到这里？

translation.en: The way everything's happened, I guess it just makes me feel more...
translation.zh: 一切都发生后 我想这让 我觉得更

translation.en: And you need help with that?
Don't you tell him my card.
translation.zh: 不准你把我的牌告诉他

translation.en: Hey, I've been getting pretty lucky, and this isn't my first time playing.
translation.zh: 我一直都很幸运 这也不是我第 一次玩

translation.en: By the way, I heard the new guy coming in got kicked out of their last squad.
translation.zh: 对了 我听说新来的家伙 是被上一队踢出来的
为了什么？ 纪律问题

translation.en: I was the leader of my last squad.
So the guy I replace went Section 8. Why?
translation.zh: 我代替的那人去了第八区 为什么？

translation.en: I heard it's 'cause this squad's so bad
translation.zh: 我听说是因为这队很糟

translation.en: he was afraid you'd get him killed when the 5th Wave hits.
translation.zh: 他害怕第五波攻击时你会害死他
现在 这也是你的队了

translation.en: and I'll rip your throats out.
I'm not taking orders from you. I'm not gonna die with you geniuses.
translation.zh: 我不听从你的指令 也不跟你这些天才死

translation.en: If anyone in this barrack touches me, I'll kill them.
translation.zh: 在这个兵营的任何人如果 碰了我 我会杀了他们

translation.en: I like to play chess. Do you play?
translation.zh: 我喜欢下棋 你会不会玩？

translation.en: But if you wanna play some strip poker later--
translation.zh: 但如果你想打点脱衣扑克
而且不准有贬低 性别歧视言论

translation.en: You had my gun the whole time! Why'd you lie?
translation.zh: 你一直有我的抢！为什么骗我？

translation.en: I was afraid you'd shoot me.
For all I knew, you were an Other.
translation.zh: 我只知道 你是个异体

translation.en: They're using those drones to hunt down survivors.
translation.zh: 他们用无人机追捕幸存者
噢 天 我要找到萨姆 凯思
聚集地点 赖特帕特森这样的地方…

translation.en: You think that Sammy's already dead?
He's alive, and I'm gonna go get him.
translation.zh: 他还活着 而我会去找他

translation.en: You're not gonna make it very far on your own.
You know what? Screw you, Evan.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？去死吧 艾文

translation.en: -I don't need you. I don't need anyone. -Cassie, come on.
translation.zh: 我不需要你 我不需要任何人

translation.en: -If you go, I'll just follow you. -Actually, no.
translation.zh: 如果你走了 我就跟着

translation.en: If I need someone to carve a cane for me...
translation.zh: 如果我需要人来帮我做个拐杖

translation.en: You can't stop me. How are you gonna stop me?
translation.zh: 你不能制止我 你怎么阻止我？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe I'll shoot you!
translation.zh: 我不知道 也许我会射你！

translation.en: What, like you shot that guy with the crucifix?
translation.zh: 什么 就像你射了十字架那家伙？
什么 你读了我的日记？

translation.en: -I didn't think you were gonna live. -Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -我没想到你会活下来 -别碰我！

translation.en: I can't promise what you'll find, but I will get you there.
translation.zh: 我无法保证你会找到什么 但我会带你去

translation.en: This is a waste of time.
Those kids are gonna be dead before their boots hit the ground.
translation.zh: 那些孩子在靴子触地前就会死

translation.en: Especially with you as squad leader.
translation.zh: 尤其是由你这个队长带领

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
You did good in school, had a bunch of friends. You probably played football.
translation.zh: 你是好学生 有一堆朋友 你也许有踢足球

translation.en: You might have even been team captain.
And then, all of a sudden, it wasn't.
No one to get weak-kneed at that pretty smile.
translation.zh: 没人被你那迷人的笑容迷晕

translation.en: You weren't ready for the end of the world.
translation.zh: 你还没为世界末日预备好

translation.en: And I was doing fine out there on my own.
translation.zh: 而我一个人在外也很好

translation.en: Till they forced me onto their stupid school bus.
translation.zh: 一直到他们强迫我上那愚蠢的校巴

translation.en: We didn't get rescued, dumbass. We got drafted.
translation.zh: 我们不是被救 蠢蛋 我们被征召入伍

translation.en: you teach us how to shoot.

translation.zh: 可爱的项链 是女友或妹妹的？

translation.en: Can you teach me that thing where you took the gun out of my hand?
translation.zh: 你能不能教我如何把枪从 我手中拿走？

translation.en: Let's just leave any potential disarming to me, -all right? -No.
translation.zh: 就把任何有可能的 撤防留给我 好吗？

translation.en: No, I need to be ready.
You don't have to be tough all the time.
translation.zh: 你不需要一直都那么坚强

translation.en: I promised Sam that I would be there for him, no matter what.
translation.zh: 我答应萨姆无论如何会救他

translation.en: I made that promise to him.
Okay. Grab the barrel of the gun with your left,
translation.zh: 好 用左手握住枪管

translation.en: and with your right, snap my hand away.
Hey, you're not gonna hurt me. All right. Like that, but stronger.
translation.zh: 嘿 你不会伤害我 知道吗 像那样 但强些

translation.en: Now at the end, you'll grab my wrist and pull it toward you.
translation.zh: 最后 抓住我的手腕将其拉向自己

translation.en: Okay. Don't be so scared of your weapon.
translation.zh: 好 别害怕你的武器

translation.en: You gotta think that the gun is a part of you.
translation.zh: 你要认为那枪是你的一部分

translation.en: Not the gun firing, you firing.
translation.zh: 不是枪在射击 是你在射击

translation.en: Zombie, the Colonel wants to see you, now.
translation.zh: 僵尸 上校想见你 现在

translation.en: Could be. Seems like a good target.
translation.zh: 可能 看来是个好的目标

translation.en: Simultaneous attacks on the last of our metropolitan areas.
translation.zh: 在我们最后的大都市区同时攻击

translation.en: A full-on invasion. This is it.
translation.zh: 一个全方位侵袭 就是这个

translation.en: Here, I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 来 我要给你看些东西

translation.en: These employ the same technology as the detector viewer from medical.
translation.zh: 这些采用医疗检测浏览器相同的技术

translation.en: We've improved it. Made it mobile.
translation.zh: 我们已改进了 使它移动自如

translation.en: The idea is to allow our soldiers in the field to instantly differentiate between friend and foe.
translation.zh: 这是让士兵在场上瞬间区分 朋友或敌人

translation.en: You look at the enemy through this and it lights 'em up green.
translation.zh: 你透过这个看敌人时绿色会亮起

translation.en: We can see them before they know they've been seen. We take back the advantage.
translation.zh: 我们可以率先发现它们 是我们的优势

translation.en: The only thing left to do now is test the optics in live conditions.
translation.zh: 现在剩下要做的是在现场 测试光学系统

translation.en: Which is why tomorrow at 2100, I'm sending four squads into battle equipped with these helmets.
translation.zh: 所以明天2100点 我送4队配备这些头盔上阵

translation.en: Your squad will be among those four.
Bring that squad back in one piece.
Yeah. Actually, you know, she was...
translation.zh: 是的 其实 你知道吗 她

translation.en: I really wish you hadn't read my journal.
translation.zh: 我真希望你没看过我日记

translation.en: I can't wait to meet him.
How do you know without a compass?
translation.zh: 你没有指南针怎么知道？

translation.en: You know, I can make one out of a pin and a glass of water.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我可以用别针 和一杯水做一个

translation.en: Didn't peg you for a Girl Scout.
I've never been a huge fan of the outdoors.
I had a scholarship to Kent State.
translation.zh: 我有肯特州立大学奖学金
以为我是乡下人 对吧？

translation.en: Zombie, are they really sending us to fight?
translation.zh: 僵尸 他们真的派我们去打战？

translation.en: Just go to sleep, all right?
But my sister called me Sams.

translation.zh: 家 我们成长的地方

translation.en: All of us are done for
Could you guys please shut up?
We live in a beautiful world
Yeah, we do Yeah, we do
translation.zh: 是 我们是 是 我们是

translation.en: We live in a beautiful world
Infiltrate enemy hornet's nest, verify enemy and terminate.
translation.zh: 打入敌人的中心地 确认并杀了敌人

translation.en: Remember, the Others light up green in your visors.
translation.zh: 记得… 异体会在护目镜亮起绿色

translation.en: At mission complete, signal for extraction.
translation.zh: 任务完成后 发信号撤退

translation.en: Holy shit, it's working. You guys, I got two of 'em straight ahead.
translation.zh: 天啊 真的行 各位 前面有两个

translation.en: TARGET DETECTED And I heard it. I was right there.
I peed. I definitely just peed.
translation.zh: 我尿了 我确实刚撒了尿

translation.en: -They're over here, too! -Run for the alley!

translation.zh: -茶杯呢？我们失去茶杯 -在这里！

translation.en: Don't do that! Don't scare me like that!
Down, down! Now, now! Down, down, down!
Don't be dead. Come on, man. Don't be dead! Please don't be dead!
translation.zh: 别死 拜托 老兄 别死！拜托你别死！

translation.en: We can't stay here. They'll be back.
translation.zh: 我们不能留在这里 他们会回来

translation.en: That alleyway. We'll have cover there.
translation.zh: 那小巷 我们会有个掩护

translation.en: If we're out in the open that long they'll pick us off one by one.
translation.zh: 我们曝露在外那么久 他们会一一灭绝我们

translation.en: When I tell you to run, run as fast as you can.
translation.zh: 我说跑时 尽力地跑

translation.en: On my go, haul ass to the alleyway.
translation.zh: 我说走时 拼你的命跑到巷子

translation.en: Back out there? Are you crazy?
Listen, Teacup, you just gotta trust me, okay? You're gonna run and don't look back.
translation.zh: 听着 茶杯 相信我 好吗？ 不回头地跑

translation.en: -What about Oompa? -He's dead, man. We gotta leave him.
translation.zh: -欧帕呢？ -他死了 我们只能留下他
对不起 兄弟 我很遗憾
僵尸 现在！ -跑！ -拼命跑！
-走 走 走！ -我们走！走！走！

translation.en: I'd hug you if I didn't think you'd punch me in the nuts for it.
translation.zh: 还有如果我不怕你会打我的 话我会抱你

translation.en: Okay, so what do we do now?
translation.zh: 好 我们现在该做什么？

translation.en: They knock planes out of the sky and cause earthquakes,
translation.zh: 它们击倒天空上的飞机 也造成地震

translation.en: but they're afraid of an army of children?
translation.zh: 但它们会怕儿童军团吗？

translation.en: There's something Vosch isn't telling us.
translation.zh: 沃什还对我们隐瞒一些东西

translation.en: Okay, I'm not risking my life for this.
translation.zh: 好 我不为这些摆上性命
成功者 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm better out there on my own.
If you know what's best for you, you'll do the same.
translation.zh: 如果你知道什么对你最好 你也会这样

translation.en: -Holy shit! What the hell is this? -Zombie, you see this?

translation.zh: -她是绿色的！ -搞什么 你们这些？

translation.en: You're one of them! You're an alien!
translation.zh: 你是它们之一！你是外星人！

translation.en: What are you talking about? I just saved your asses!
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我刚救了你！

translation.en: If she's one of them, we have to take her out now. Poundcake, just calm down, all right?
translation.zh: -如果她是 要杀了她 -蛋糕 冷静 好吗？

translation.en: I can see it inside of her!
translation.zh: 我可以看到它在她里面！

translation.en: -Zombie, what do we do? Do we shoot her? -It's your call, Zombie.
translation.zh: -该怎么办？杀她？ -由你决定 僵尸

translation.en: -Oh, my God! What's going on, man? -Come on, man.
translation.zh: 噢 天！发生什么事 老兄？

translation.en: Hey. Put your guns down. Put your guns down.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 把枪放下

translation.en: Don't shoot. Calm down. She's not an Other. Neither am I.
translation.zh: 别射 冷静点 她不是异体 我也不是

translation.en: Come on, Dumbo. You know who I am. Put the guns down.
translation.zh: 拜托 小飞 你知道我是谁 把枪放下

translation.en: Just put 'em down! I'm not an Other.
translation.zh: 就放下！ 我不是一个异体

translation.en: I don't even think any of those people out there shooting at us are Others.
translation.zh: 我根本不认为那些射我们的是异体

translation.en: They lied to us. They lied to us, man.
Green doesn't mean alien. Green means human.
translation.zh: 绿色并不代表外星人 绿色代表人类

translation.en: Those lenses, these trackers, it's all fake, man.
translation.zh: 这些透镜 跟踪器… 都是假的 兄弟

translation.en: It's an illusion. It's a trick.
translation.zh: 是个幻觉 是个骗局

translation.en: They weren't testing these. They were testing us.
translation.zh: 他们并不是测试这些 他 们在考验我们

translation.en: They were seeing how we would do, how we would hold up under pressure.
translation.zh: 他们在看我们会做什么 我们如何承受压力

translation.en: All right? If we would do what we were trained to do.
translation.zh: 知道吗？ 如果我们做我们被训练的事

translation.en: -To kill Others! -No, to kill the survivors, man!
translation.zh: 去杀异体！ 不 去杀幸存者 兄弟！

translation.en: Well, what about the guys outside, the ones that were shooting at us?
translation.zh: 那外面那些射击我们的人呢？

translation.en: Why would the Army want us to kill other humans?
translation.zh: 为什么军队要我们杀其它人类？
因为军队 仁妮柯 沃什

translation.en: And because we're kids, they thought they could manipulate us into doing their dirty work.
translation.zh: 因为我们是儿童 它们以为可以摆布我们
我们不是在抗战第五波

translation.en: We go AWOL. This means we can't go back. You know that, right?
translation.zh: 我们撤离军队 意思是不能再回去 知道吧？

translation.en: I left him back at the base.

translation.zh: 我尝试保护他 啊 天
-我该回去 -那是自杀 老兄

translation.en: -No, man. I gotta go back. -You can't just wander back in there.
translation.zh: -不 我一定要回去 -你不能就这样回去
-它们会知道 -我不能让他留在那里！

translation.en: I'll put the tracker back in. They'll pick me up.
translation.zh: 我会把追踪器放回 他们会接我

translation.en: You guys go ahead. I will meet up with you later.
translation.zh: 你们去吧 我再和你们汇合

translation.en: Dumbo, where can I take a bullet in the torso and not die?
translation.zh: 小飞 我上身哪个部位是射不死的？

translation.en: Where can I take a bullet in the torso? I gotta make it look real.
translation.zh: 我没开玩笑 哪个部位？ 我要做得逼真

translation.en: It's the only way I'm getting back in alive.
translation.zh: 是我唯一可以活着回去的方法

translation.en: It's impossible, man. There's too many organs.
translation.zh: 不可能 兄弟 太多器官了

translation.en: Ringer, she can make the shot, all right? I know she can.
translation.zh: 成功者 她可以射 对吧？ 我知道她能

translation.en: You want me to shoot you?
Don't pretend like you haven't thought about it.
Where do you want me to shoot him?

translation.zh: 我的意思是 那个 噢 天

translation.en: You're out of your drone sector.
translation.zh: 你已离开你的无人机范围

translation.en: Put the gun down. Stay away.
If I was gonna kill you, Cassie, I would've done it a long time ago.
translation.zh: 如我要杀你 凯思 我早就动手了

translation.en: You're one of them. You're a fucking Other.
translation.zh: 你是它们其中之一 你是个混蛋异体

translation.en: This isn't the first time the Others have been here.
translation.zh: 这不是异体第一次来这里

translation.en: They came before and created sleeper agents, like me.
translation.zh: 它们来过并创造了待用特务 像我

translation.en: Growing up, there was this voice in my head.
translation.zh: 成长时 我脑中有个声音

translation.en: It was quiet, but it was there.
translation.zh: 它很安静 但它就在那里

translation.en: it was like a switch was flipped inside me,
translation.zh: 就像我里面的开关被启动了

translation.en: How many people have you killed?
The disease that the Others created. The disease that you created.
translation.zh: 是异体创造的病毒 你创造的病毒

translation.en: Our kind believe that love is just a trick.
translation.zh: 我们的族认为爱只是一种幻觉

translation.en: A way to protect your genetic future.
translation.zh: 一个保护你基因未来的方法

translation.en: It was like you flipped the switch back.
translation.zh: 就好像你把开关关上了

translation.en: You made me wanna be human again.
Love's not a trick. It's real.
translation.zh: 爱不是幻觉 是真的

translation.en: I know now because of you.
I don't wanna hear any more.
Cassie, please, just let me help you.
translation.zh: 凯思 求求你 让我帮你

translation.en: All I wanna do is help you find Sam.
All right. Get on your knees, Evan.
All right. Come on, just get on your knees.
The Army is controlled by the Others.

translation.zh: 他们正预备着那些孩子

translation.en: All right, copy that, Tango Three.
The rest of the squad are reported KIA.
Ma'am, it's all right. It's all right. We've got you.
translation.zh: 女士 没事的 没事的 你安全了

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
You know why you're here, Cassie?
translation.zh: 知不知道你为什么在这 凯思？

translation.en: We tried to move to cover, but as soon as we did...
translation.zh: 我们尝试移动来掩护 但我们 一行动
它们无处不在 长官

translation.en: -I took a bullet, sir. -But you survived.
translation.zh: 我也中弹了 长官 但你存活了

translation.en: the way that bullet went right through you and managed to...
You drop your lie, and I'll drop mine.
translation.zh: 你停止说谎 我也是

translation.en: You're gonna kill me, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你会杀了我 是不是

translation.en: What's the point of any of this?
Other than occupy a space we need.
translation.zh: 除了占有我们需要的空间

translation.en: We're not that different, Ben. Your kind would do exactly the same thing.
translation.zh: 我们没什么差别 你的族类也做同样的事

translation.en: Our kind wouldn't have wiped out an entire species.
translation.zh: 我的族类 也不至于消灭整个物种

translation.en: You've been doing it for centuries.
translation.zh: 你们一直在做了几百年
长官 仁妮柯上士死了

translation.en: There's more. Three guards were killed at the west gate...
translation.zh: 还有 三个保安在西门被杀还有…

translation.en: An explosion, sir. It came from inside the base.
translation.zh: 一个爆炸 来自基地内部

translation.en: -Get rid of him. -Damage to Sector Three!
We need to move all the recruits off-base. Get 'em on planes to Wonderland now.
translation.zh: 要把新兵带离基地 让他们 上机到奇境去

translation.en: Deploy units. Find out who's attacking us.
translation.zh: 部署单位 找出是谁在攻击我们

translation.en: They're taking out our security cameras.
translation.zh: 他们除掉了我们的监控摄像头

translation.en: Bring the drones home so we can see who's attacking us.
translation.zh: 带无人机回来看是谁在攻击我们

translation.en: -Don't move! Don't move! -It's okay! Okay, all right!
translation.zh: -别动 知道吗！别动！ -没事！好 好的！

translation.en: Cassie? My name's Ben Parish. We used to go to high school together.
translation.zh: 凯思？我是宾佩里什 我们曾 一起上高校

translation.en: I'm looking for my brother, Sam.
translation.zh: 我在找我弟弟 萨姆
萨姆苏利文？萨姆苏利文？

translation.en: -You know my brother? -Yes, we're in the same squad.
translation.zh: -你认识我弟弟？ -是 我们在同队

translation.en: -You know where he is? -I'm trying to get to him.
translation.zh: -你知道他在哪里吗？ -我正去找他

translation.en: All recruits report to the transport area.
translation.zh: 所有新兵到运输区报到

translation.en: They're sending the kids off to war.
translation.zh: 它们正把孩子们送上战场
沃什 军队 它们是异体

translation.en: Look, Sam is about to get on one of those planes.
translation.zh: 看 萨姆正上着其中一架机

translation.en: If we don't go now, you're not gonna see him again. You understand?
translation.zh: 现在不走你永远见不到他 明白吗？

translation.en: -Recruits report to the transport area. -All right.
translation.zh: 所有新兵到运输区域报到

translation.en: Once the recruits reach Wonderland, get them ready for immediate deployment.
translation.zh: 一旦新兵到达奇境 让他们准备 立即部署

translation.en: No, it's fine. He's one of us. It's okay.
translation.zh: 不 没事 他站在我们这边 没事

translation.en: Evan, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 艾文 你在这里干什么？
他只是刚巧… 在这里

translation.en: I told you not to follow me.
Well, I decided to ignore you.
In about ten minutes, when the last plane full of kids takes off,
translation.zh: 10分钟后 当最后一班满载孩子的机起飞

translation.en: I'm taking this place down, for good.
I'm sorry I lied to you, Cassie.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我骗了你 凯思

translation.en: I was wrong when I said I was both one of you and one of them.
translation.zh: 我说我同时是你们和异体的 一员是错的

translation.en: You can't be both. You have to choose.
translation.zh: 我们不能两个都是 我们 一定要选择

translation.en: I think Evan Walker's about to blow this place up.
translation.zh: 我想艾文瓦克将要把这地方炸毁

translation.en: Proceed to the transport vehicles in a calm and orderly fashion.
translation.zh: 平静而有序的方式下前进至交通工具
赶快 向前走 各位

translation.en: -Stay with your group leader. -Keep it moving.
translation.zh: 跟着你的组长 继续走

translation.en: -Don't fall behind, everyone. -Where do they think they're going?
translation.zh: -别脱离队伍 -他们认为要到哪里去？

translation.en: Once you are on the plane, you will receive further instructions.
translation.zh: 你一上机 就会有进一步的说明

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 噢 我的天 噢 我的天
我们该走了 知道吗？

translation.en: I missed you so much, Sam.
Look what I brought back for you.
I gotta take his tracker out.
translation.zh: 我该把他的追踪器拿掉

translation.en: All right? It's not gonna hurt, okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？不会痛的 知道吗？
是的 长官 还有六组

translation.en: Power up my bird. Last plane's in the air, evacuate the base.
translation.zh: 开启引擎 最后一架飞机起飞 撤离基地

translation.en: Run, run! Go for the truck.
-Quick, Sammy. Get in! -All right, come on! Get in! Get in!
translation.zh: -快 萨姆 进来！ -好 快！进去！进去！
-好点了？ -是的 谢谢 小飞

translation.en: Make sure you give her the food first.
Let me know if it starts hurting or anything like that.
translation.zh: 如果开始痛了或什么的就让我知道

translation.en: It's a little early, isn't it?
You were named after a star, right?
translation.zh: 你的名字取自星星 对吗？

translation.en: I was named after Ben & Jerry's.
translation.zh: 我的名字来自宾和杰里

translation.en: Nothing made my dad happier than ice cream.
translation.zh: 冰淇淋让我爸爸最开心

translation.en: I'm sure you made him happier.
We have to save those other kids.
How are we gonna do that?
and just go get something to eat.

translation.zh: 来 起身了 老友

translation.en: Come on, lazy bones. Put your bear down, would you?
translation.zh: 来 懒惰虫 把熊放下 可以吗？

translation.en: The Others see our hope as a weakness,
translation.zh: 异体认为我们的希望是弱点

translation.en: It's our hope that lets us survive.
translation.zh: 是我们的希望让我们生存下去

translation.en: That lets us bend, but remain unbroken.
translation.zh: 它让我们忍耐但不被战败

translation.en: -You two knew each other? -Yeah, we went to high school together.
translation.zh: -你们认识对方？ -是 我们同校

translation.en: It's our hope that will let us win one day.
translation.zh: 是我们的希望让我们有一天会胜利

translation.en: It's our hope that makes us human.
translation.zh: 是我们的希望使我们有人性
